Description: Buruj Cooperative Insurance (Known as: Buruj) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2010. It operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Property and Casualty Insurance. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Multi-line Insurance and Property and Casualty Insurance. Buruj is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 2009.
